item.title: Intergate Vue in Django
item.description: Intergate Vue in Django What Project Will We Build We want to build a vue project with multiple pages. The Django view render these pages as templates. Why We Build Such A Project If we seperate frond-end and back-end and all routers are handled by the front-end project. The attackers can fake the reponse of authentication and jump to the target pages. If the attackers get the front-end code all in one package without authentication, they can parse out API easily.
